name: Turkish Hand-Painted Ceramic Tiles
description: Authentic Turkish Ottoman ceramic tiles, hand-painted with intricate patterns, bringing the rich heritage of Turkish art to your walls and floors.

name: Gothic Stained Glass Panels
description: Intricately designed Gothic Revival stained glass panels, inspired by medieval architecture, adding a touch of elegance to windows and ceilings.

name: Attangudi Tiles
description: Traditional Attangudi tiles from Tamil Nadu, India, known for their vibrant colors and unique patterns, adding a touch of South Indian charm to your floors.

name: Marrakech Zellige Tiles
description: Marrakech Zellige tiles, handcrafted in Morocco, known for their vibrant colors and geometric patterns, capturing the essence of Moroccan architecture.

name: Venetian Terrazzo Flooring
description: Venetian Terrazzo flooring, inspired by Renaissance architecture in Venice, Italy, showcasing the timeless beauty of marble chips embedded in cement.

name: Balinese Batik Textiles
description: Exquisite Balinese Batik textiles, featuring traditional patterns and colors, adding a touch of Balinese culture and artistry to your walls.

name: Portuguese Azulejos Tiles
description: Portuguese Azulejos tiles, a symbol of Portuguese culture, featuring intricate patterns and vivid colors, perfect for creating a stunning focal point on your walls.

name: Burmese Teak Wood Flooring
description: Burmese Teak Wood flooring, known for its durability and rich color variations, adding warmth and elegance to any space.

name: Japanese Washi Paper Wall Coverings
description: Japanese Washi Paper wall coverings, reflecting the minimalist aesthetics of Japanese design, allowing diffused light to create a serene ambiance.

name: Moroccan Zellige Tiles
description: Moroccan Zellige tiles, handcrafted by skilled artisans, showcase vibrant geometric patterns and bold colors, adding a touch of exoticism to your walls.

description: Italian Carrara Marble flooring, renowned for its timeless beauty and classic elegance, transforms spaces into luxurious sanctuaries.

description: Indian Bidriware Inlay Panel, a masterpiece of Indian craftsmanship, featuring intricate silver inlay work on a black background, adding opulence to your walls.

name: Japanese Shou Sugi Ban Wood
description: Japanese Shou Sugi Ban Wood, a traditional technique of charring wood for enhanced durability, offers a distinct and rich aesthetic to both walls and floors.

description: Mexican Talavera Ceramic Tiles, adorned with vibrant and intricate hand-painted patterns, bring the warmth and artistry of Mexican culture to your walls.

description: Spanish Alhambra Mosaic Flooring, inspired by the intricate patterns of the Alhambra palace, exudes a blend of history and elegance for your floors.

description: Moroccan Zellige Tiles, famous for their vibrant geometric patterns, bring the exotic beauty of Moroccan design to your walls and floors.

description: Indian Bidriware Inlay, showcasing intricate silver inlay on a black base, adds a touch of Indian craftsmanship and heritage to your walls.

description: Moroccan Zellige Tiles, characterized by vibrant geometric patterns, reflect the rich history and cultural heritage of Morocco, bringing warmth and elegance to your walls and floors.

description: Kerala Bamboo Matting, handwoven from natural bamboo, adds an eco-friendly touch to your floors and ceilings. The traditional craftsmanship of Kerala is reflected in each sheet, providing a sustainable and elegant solution.

description: Mexican Talavera Ceramic Tiles, adorned with vibrant Talavera patterns, bring the rich cultural heritage of Mexico to your walls and floors, creating a stunning display of tradition and artistry.

description: African Terracotta Roof Tiles, made from earthy terracotta, embrace the traditional roofing style of Africa, providing both aesthetic appeal and durability to protect your home.
